data.name: Prime Friends of Mersenne and Fermat
data.description:
Prime Friends of Mersenne and Fermat

Given an input number, generate the closest Fermat number 
and produce closest the Mersenne prime sequence up to 524,287,
starting at the smallest Mersenne number that's bigger than or equal to the input.

In the case where the input number is right in-between two Fermat
numbers, choose the one that's bigger. The input should be less 
than 524,287. If no value given then return "Fermat Friends: []; Mersenne Friends: []". 
If over 524,287, throw "Input Value Too Large".

Fermat Numbers: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fermat_number
Mersenne Numbers: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mersenne_prime


For example, for input=4, the returned value would be:

"Fermat Friends: 5; Mersenne Friends: 7,31,127,8191,131071,524287"
